title: APIs and JSON
overview: APIs allow Python to communicate with external services, while JSON is a lightweight data format used for exchanging information.
practice: Call any public API and print its JSON response.
Extract and print any field from a JSON response.
Write a Python program that fetches weather data and prints the temperature.
Parse a JSON list and print each item.

quiz.question: Which library is commonly used to fetch API data in Python?

summary: APIs allow Python to access real-time data from the internet, and JSON is the format used to store and transmit that data. Learning both is essential for modern Python development.
